text: Hello, How are you doing?
I'm doing okay, how are you?
I am doing good. How is your day so far/
It's going alright. I had class this afternoon and just turking the rest of the day.
Okay, all I need to do is turking whole day
How much money do you make turking?
around $1500 per month
Dang thats a good amount! What scripts are you running?
And What about you how much do you earn turking.
I just started the other day so I'm not sure yet. Running TO, Hourly, and HIT Scraper
That's good to hear, I am sure you are going to earn a good amount
Thanks lol, I'm trying. Does your task say something about donations?
Yes, I can see something which relates to save the children donation.
Mine just says that I can choose any amount from $0-2
It says here that I can donate the extra gain which I earn I can donate it to the children
What are you thinking about donating? I don't know if it would actually go to a foundation
I wish to donate because that is very small amount and I am happy that I can help them at least this way
I'd be willing to donate $1
That's great<,I would also donate around $1 to $2
Okay, lets each donate $1
